summary: Story of the same couple, first in their teenage years and then in their twilight years, paradoxically set in the same time during the backdrop of the Gulf War in the Middle East.
cast: Sarah Polley|Brendan Fletcher|Sean McCann|Shirley Douglas|Diane Ladd|Kelci Stephenson|Rob Patterson|Jennifer Villaverde|Susie Yamamota|Tracey McCorrister|Kristen Thomson|Rob Stefaniuk|Allegra Fulton|Tom Anniko|Victor Cowie|Stan Lesk|Robert Huculak|Nancy Jane Drake|Chris Sigurdson|James Durham|Rick Skene|Darcy Fehr|Henry Nelken|Jan Skene|Deb Patterson|Sharon Bajer|Wesley Cade|Bronwyn Dobchuk-Land|Dammara Kovnats Hall|Anne MacPherson|James Kee|Mary Long|Kate Lynch|Kent Staines|David Barkman|Nikki Fritz|Jasmine Guy|Rachel Seenie|Bob Washington|Catherine McClintock
title: The Law of Enclosures
